title: Treasures of the earth
brief_description: Highlights some of the new techniques being used in exploration, transporting and handling of natural resources in order to meet the increasing needs of modern society. Demonstrates new methods employing electronics, computers, lasers, aircraft, heavy machinery, and seismic equipment in locating additional resources on land and beneath the seas. Industrial promotional film for Litton Industries.
